name: Lots of Zoms
description:
Defend against endless zombies and kill patient zero (the one that started it all) to end the zombie breakout once and for all.

Created for the Quarantine Jam

Buggy, very basic, no sound -- more of a test of spawning many simple AI's in Godot 3.2

Mouse: Aim

Left Mouse Click: Fire
Up Arrow or 'W': Move forward
Down Arrow or 'S': Move backward
